member.name: UI_ANIMATION_MANAGER_STATUS
member.summary: Defines the activity status of an animation manager.

member.name: UI_ANIMATION_MANAGER_STATUS.UI_ANIMATION_MANAGER_IDLE
member.summary: The animation manager is idle; no animations are currently playing.

member.name: UI_ANIMATION_MANAGER_STATUS.UI_ANIMATION_MANAGER_BUSY
member.summary: The animation manager is busy; at least one animation is currently playing or scheduled.
